overview: When Johnny Riley drops in to meet hunky new neighbor Markie More, he makes himself at home in his apartment, and even helps himself to a piece of Markie's hot ass. After Gabriel Cross moves clear across the country for a fresh start, he's shocked to find his stalker Jonah Marx in his new small town, and weirdly relieved to fuck his familiar face. Curious neighbor Johnny Riley quietly strokes himself while watching Markie More showering, before surprising him a boner to suck. When stranded Scotty Zee knocks on celebrity Christian Bay's door, the singer is weary of stalkers but lets the motorist use his phone and his asshole.
title: Gotta Have Him Bareback
